title: Nuage Utility Host VM
description: Configuration for Nuage Utility Host VM.

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: Hostname of the Nuage Utility Host instance

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

upgrade_vmname.title: Upgrade VM Name
upgrade_vmname.description: Virtual Machine name of the new NUH. Used during Upgrade only

mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: IP address of the management interface

mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management IP Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the management network

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Gateway IP
mgmt_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the management network

internal_ip.title: Internal Network IP address
internal_ip.description: IP address of the internal network interface. Used for VSD connection when configured

internal_ip_prefix.title: Internal Network IP Prefix Length
internal_ip_prefix.description: IP Prefix length for the internal network

internal_gateway.title: Internal Network Gateway IP
internal_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the internal network

external_interface_list.title: External interface name list
external_interface_list.description: Name of the external interface as defined in the nuh_internal_interface file

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the KVM hypervisor where the NUH VM will be instantiated

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment where VMs will be instantiated. Use 'none' when skipping predeploy.

custom_configuration_file_location.title: Custom NUH configuration file location
custom_configuration_file_location.description: Optional user specified location of the yaml based configuration file for the NUH. This will replace the default yaml configuration file added by MetroAE

skip_vsd_installed_check.title: Skip VSD installed check
skip_vsd_installed_check.description: Enable this option to install NUH in situations where no VSD is present

health_monitoring_agent.title: Health monitoring agent
health_monitoring_agent.description: Enables setup of a health monitoring agent

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, NUH requires 4 cores and sample values will be of the form [ 0, 1, 2, 3 ]

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface on the NUH. This will be a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to the global setting

internal_bridge.title: Internal Network Bridge
internal_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the internal network on the NUH. This will be a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to using management bridge

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the VSD VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the VSD VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the VSD VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

openstack_image.title: OpenStack Image
openstack_image.description: Name of image installed on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_flavor.title: OpenStack Flavor
openstack_flavor.description: Name of instance flavor installed on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_availability_zone.title: OpenStack Availability Zone
openstack_availability_zone.description: Name of availability zone on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_network.title: OpenStack Network
openstack_network.description: Name of network on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_subnet.title: OpenStack Subnet
openstack_subnet.description: Name of subnet on OpenStack for VSTAT

openstack_port_security_groups.title: OpenStack Port Security Groups
openstack_port_security_groups.description: Set of security groups to associate with Mgmt interface

vsd_fqdn.title: VSD FQDN
vsd_fqdn.description: FQDN of the VSD or VSD cluster
